text: The Man Who Walked Alone is a 1945 American romantic comedy movie directed by Christy Cabanne and starring Dave O'Brien, Kay Aldridge, Walter Catlett, Guinn "Big Boy" Williams, Isabel Randolph, Smith Ballew. It was distributed by PRC Pictures, Inc. and was nominated for an Academy Award in 1946. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1945 romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Christy Cabanne
title: The Man Who Walked Alone
